limit.description:
Max records per batch across all entity types combined (global cap).

The server merges changes from all categories and stops when the total
payload reaches `limit`. Default: 1000, Maximum allowed: 10000.

since.description: Timestamp in milliseconds since epoch. Returns changes after this time.

applied.description: Number of changes accepted and written (LWW won).

skipped.description: Number of changes silently rejected because the server had a newer version (LWW lost).
